item.title: A man was sentenced to 475 years for dogfighting. The sport is surprisingly prevalent
item.description: A man who was arrested with over 100 dogs and equipment at his Georgia home got the maximum sentence last week. Prosecutors hope it sheds light on the...

item.title: About 10 people are dead in a shooting at an adult education center in Sweden
item.description: Swedish police said that about 10 people, including the gunman, were killed during a shooting Tuesday at an adult education center.

item.title: Neil Gaiman's former nanny files rape, human trafficking lawsuit
item.description: The lawsuit alleges that Gaiman coerced sexual services from his former live-in nanny, and that Palmer "knowingly benefited" from Gaiman's actions.

item.title: RFK Jr. appears on his way to being Trump's health secretary after a party-line vote
item.description: RFK Jr.'s nomination cleared the Senate Finance Committee by a 14-13 party line vote.

item.title: The moon's grand canyons were carved in the blink of an eye
item.description: The Earth's Grand Canyon took millions of years to carve, but the moon's grand canyons took about ten minutes.
